<Text: The Guadalcanal Campaign, also known as the Battle of Guadalcanal and codenamed Operation Watchtower was a military campaign fought between 7 August 1942 and 9 February 1943 on and around the island of Guadalcanal in the Pacific theater of World War II.>
Triplets:<The Guadalcanal Campaign
1:
--------------------
<Text: Guadalcanal Campaign:  It was the first major offensive by Allied forces against the Empire of Japan.>
